channel.title: Plugins for photo_manager
channel.description: Recent content on Plugins for photo_manager

item.title: compatibility of photo_manager_image_provider
item.description: The commit of flutter remove ImageStreamCompleter.load method. Since flutter 3.14.0, the photo_manager_image_provider need use 2.0.0 version. image_provider flutter photo_manager ^1.0.0 “>=2.0.0 <3.14.0” ^2.0.0 ^2.0.0 ^3.14.0 ^2.0.0
